item.description:
Thanks to fellow Newcomer member Brian for this great meetup idea!

We will be going to Lazer Wars in North Smithfield to play laser tag. If you've never played before, the idea is to shoot your opponent team while wearing computerized vests.

We will decide, as a group, how many rounds we want to play. It is usually ten minutes per round.

The prices are:
1 round - $4
2 rounds - $7
3 rounds - $10
4 rounds - $13
5 rounds - $15

If the group decides to, we may venture to a local restaurant or coffeeshop for food/drinks afterwards.

If the event is full, feel free to put yourself on the waiting list.
item.name: Laser Tag
